meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of alertness.
meanings.sent1: The drowsy driver struggled to focus on the road ahead, feeling his eyelids droop.
meanings.sent2: The drowsy student missed the important details in class due to his lack of alertness.
meanings.sent3: The drowsy sloth moved so slowly, it seemed almost stuck in a perpetual state of sleepiness.
meanings.sent4: The drowsy computer took ages to respond to any commands, frustrating the user.
meanings.sent5: The drowsy afternoon sun cast a warm, hazy light over the sleepy town.
